subject: Doping (Sports)
Tests (Drug Use)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun’s exoneration by an arbitration panel illustrates how Major League Baseball’s drug-testing policy falls below the most rigorous standards of effectiveness and legitimacy.
snippet: Ryan Braun’s exoneration by an arbitration panel illustrates how Major League Baseball’s drug-testing policy falls below the most rigorous standards of effectiveness and legitimacy.
